projects.title: Developer - Blogging Website
projects.bodyText: blogging website features JWT-based authentication (login, signup, logout), blog management with pagination, and user profile functionality. It incorporates AI for spell checking, content summarization, and a custom chatbot. SEO is enhanced using NLP for auto-generating tags and recommendations.

projects.title: PaceDream Full Stack Developer
projects.bodyText: PaceDream is an innovative property management platform designed to cater to a wide range of rental needs, offering users unparalleled flexibility and choice. As a comprehensive solution, PaceDream stands out from the competition by allowing users to manage various rental types, making it a one-stop platform for property rentals.
